Package PaystubKB

Class PaystubKB

java.lang.Object
PaystubKB.PaystubKB
public class PaystubKB extends Object
Name: PaystubTest2 Abstract: This program will calculate the Gross Earnings, FICA tax, Federal Withheld and Net Amount of the payroll check for each employee of a company.
Author:
Keith Brock

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method serves as the entry point for the PaystubKB program. It calculates the Gross Earnings, FICA tax, Federal Withheld, and Net Amount of payroll checks for each employee of a company.
      Parameters:
      args - None

    • CalculateGross

      public static float CalculateGross(Float dblHourlyWage, Float dblHoursWorked)
      Name: CalculateGross Abstract: Calculates the gross pay based on hourly wage and hours worked, including overtime pay at 1.5x for hours over 40.
      Parameters:
      dblHourlyWage - The hourly wage of the employee as a Float.
      dblHoursWorked - The total hours worked by the employee as a Float.
      Returns:
      Returns the gross pay as a float, including 1.5x pay for hours worked over 40.

    • CalculateFederal

      public static float CalculateFederal(float dblGrossEarnings, int intWithholdings, String strMaritalStatus)
      Name: CalculateWithholdings Abstract: Calculates the federal tax withheld based on adjusted gross income and marital status.
      Parameters:
      dblGrossEarnings - The gross earnings of the employee as a float.
      intWithholdings - The number of withholding exemptions as an integer.
      strMaritalStatus - The marital status of the employee ("Single" or "Married").
      Returns:
      Returns the calculated federal tax as a float.

    • CalculateNetIncome

      public static double CalculateNetIncome(float dblGrossEarnings, double dblMedicare, double dblSocialSecurityTax, float dblFederal)
      Name: CalculateNetIncome Abstract: Calculates the net income by subtracting Medicare, Social Security, and federal taxes from gross earnings.
      Parameters:
      dblGrossEarnings - The gross earnings of the employee as a float.
      dblMedicare - The Medicare tax as a double.
      dblSocialSecurityTax - The Social Security tax as a double.
      dblFederal - The federal tax as a float.
      Returns:
      Returns the calculated net income as a double.

    • CalculateMedicareTax

      public static double CalculateMedicareTax(float dblGrossEarnings)
      Name: CalculateMedicareTax Abstract: Calculates the Medicare tax based on the gross earnings.
      Parameters:
      dblGrossEarnings - The gross earnings of the employee as a float.
      Returns:
      Returns the Medicare tax as a double, calculated at 1.45% of gross earnings.

    • DisplayGrandTotals

      public static void DisplayGrandTotals(float dblTotalGrossIncome, double dblTotalMedicareTax, double dblTotalSocialSecurityTax, double dblTotalFICATax, float dblTotalFederalTax, double dblTotalNetIncome)
      Name: DisplayGrandTotals Abstract: Displays the grand totals for all employees, including total gross income, Medicare tax, Social Security tax, FICA tax, income tax withheld, and net income.
      Parameters:
      dblTotalGrossIncome - The total gross income for all employees as a float.
      dblTotalMedicareTax - The total Medicare tax for all employees as a double.
      dblTotalSocialSecurityTax - The total Social Security tax for all employees as a double.
      dblTotalFICATax - The total FICA tax for all employees as a double.
      dblTotalFederalTax - The total federal income tax withheld for all employees as a float.
      dblTotalNetIncome - The total net income for all employees as a double.
